page.title: 09HEALTH 2
page.content: The most used equipment is bed linen,x-ray machines and thermometers. The success rate is about 80%.The hospital has 740 beds and a staff of 1600. There are 8 ambulances plus 1 van at Law Hospital,covering all Lanarkshire and the surrounding areas. An ambulance can hold 8 sitting or 2 lying down.They are controlled by the Scottish Ambulance Association. There is a kitchen staff of 57.The dining room holds 500 people at once. The staff have a menu but the patients have a choice of two.The staff on night shift also get a meal.
